body_html: Oh yes, optimizers should use get_variable. I think slot_creator already does (as you can see above, the big Adam and Adam_1 variables are already scoped correctly). But we missed the scalars (beta1_power beta2_power). It might apply only to Adam, but I don't see how we can be fully backwards-compatible here, since the goals is to change the name of the Variable. Eugene, do you see a way out? Can we break it? (Most people have optimizers in top-scope I think, they'll be fine, but some will be broken.)
